attributes.action: The removal of Dipu Ahad from Newcastle council
attributes.additional_details:
Dipu Ahad is a bully what stops freedom of speech using the police and council at his expense & making up lies in his favor in the name of a religion.  Here is a website with Dipu's achievements, we believe this retrobate should be removed from Newcastle city council

http://www.dipuahad.co.uk/
